name: Earth Child Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Wis 13, dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 3 ranks.

sections.text: While using this style, your defensive training dodge bonus to AC increases to +6. Further, against creatures of the giant subtype, you can add your Wisdom bonus on your unarmed strike damage rolls.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your martial training makes you a dangerous and elusive target for giants.
